alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 11:17AM PST until January 24 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Kittitas Valley. In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense freezing fog are lingering across the Foothills of the Blue Mountains while more widespread dense freezing fog is persisting in the Kittitas Valley. Elsewhere, generally improving conditions have been observed this morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
